[h1] Not playing Overwatch was one of the best decisions I have ever taken. [/h1]

Everything about this game that could be isn't, and everything that it shouldn't is. A real shitshow of a game. I wanted to give this game a try after so many years, but the horrible experience I had just reinforced my belief that I really should avoid Blizzard games in its totality.

No one, literally no one asked for 5v5. A part of the fun about this game was the freedom you had in team-building and countering, but you're now forced into a meta and rules that don't even know what they want to be. Every heroes are basically DPS but with different flavors. There seems to be no emphasis on team effort anymore, everyone plays on their own. You basically have to carry of get carried.

Community sucks. I am terribly sorry if you're a real one out there. Every other match someone has to complain and be toxic. The fact that the new scoreboard makes all your stats visible entices others to shun you down even more.

Horrible monetization and malicious misinformation practices. Everything is purchasable and the prices aren't even worth it. CAD $26 for a skin? Weren't we able to redeem cosmetics by accumulating coins, which were fairly easy and rewarding to obtain? Now I have to make my way through way too much hours of game time just for a shitty battle pass system that doesn't even give me what I want.

PVE is garbage. Thank God for streaming and uploading, now I know it really isn't worth it. You're telling me I have to pay yet again just to punch clueless adds and watch three cutscenes for something that has the quality of a typical event? Choke on some fucking cinnamon. They promised - and showcased - skill trees and much more, but none of that became a reality. PVE has no replayablity and if you really do care about the story, you should just watch them online.

False sense of excitement and progression. They seem to randomly buff and overpower certain heroes just to make you think it's a positive thing, which in fact is called unbalanced. All the efforts are sprayed thin and nothing feels polished except for the fact that the game tries to trick you into thinking you're progressing towards something, which in fact only works towards enticing you to empty your wallet. Galaxy brain psychology tricks!



Never in my life have I played a game where I left off worse than I was before. I did not have a single amount of fun playing this.

红烧肉好吃，但是你放2天在热一下告诉我这是新红烧肉2我他么不能接受，冷饭抄的他么这么恶心的也就暴雪了。每一个暴黑都他么是暴白我终于理解了，老子16岁开始玩暴雪，到现在42岁了。终于成功演变成了暴黑，吃相真他么难看操。从DOTA时代开始，暴雪有过无数次准确的选择可以继续坐稳神坛，可惜。至今为止，一次选择都没对，屎都吃不上热乎的，还能怎么样，永远就是泰裤辣，暴雪教你玩游戏，傲慢的公司终将如诺基亚一样湮灭。

通用场景
Braised meat is delicious, but you put 2 days in the heat to tell me that this is the new braised meat 2 I can not accept, cold rice copy him so disgusting also blizzard. I finally understand that I started playing Blizzard at the age of 16, and now I'm 42 years old. Finally successfully evolved into a violent black, eating really he ugly fuck. Since the DOTA era, Blizzard has had countless accurate choices to continue to sit on the altar, but unfortunately. So far, a choice is not right, shit is not hot, how can it be, it will always be hot Thai pants, Blizzard teach you to play games, arrogant companies will eventually annihilate like Nokia.

The core gameplay itself I have zero issues with, but literally every other aspect of this game ESPECIALLY the monetization schemes, and Blizzard falling short of their promise for a PvE mode is why I am giving this a negative review. 

It's really upsetting to see Blizzard smear all of their beloved IPs with their own fecal matter, and it's even more upsetting that Overwatch, which initially was free from this smearing, eventually succumbed due to Activision Blizzard's greed.

Do not give them a single penny, do not encourage them to do anymore disgusting practices like this. If you want to play the game for the core gameplay, that is fine.

我依旧记得那个夏天，和朋友们一起玩守望先锋的日子，我依旧记得那段同学来我家玩电脑的时光。那是我无数个日夜梦寐以求朝思暮想回去的夏天，但一切都已经过去了。这游戏对我的意义毋庸置疑，游戏是好游戏，一直都是好游戏，只是暴雪不再是那个暴雪了。我不会为这样的傻逼公司买单，我已经为我的青春付过两份原价游戏的钱了，一切都结束了。没有人可以回到那个夏天，没有人应该被困在那个夏天。再见。

Overwatch is one of the best shooters in the market, with an enviable character design and gunplay that has led to one of the best competitive scenes.

However, unfortunately, the current Blizzard is a shadow of what it used to be. Business decisions have ruined fantastic games like Overwatch, with choices that are hard to understand, such as the release of Overwatch 2 and a poorly executed PvE system, which feels cut and a battle pass.

Hopefully, there will be a deep reflection from the executive producers, as this is a great game that, with the right direction, can achieve the position it deserves as one of the best competitive games today.

Sinceramente... Vamos lá, Overwatch, jogo lançado em 2016, 24 de maio de 2016 para ser mais exato. Lembro exatamente como era jogar esse jogo em seu lançamento. Uma simples garoto que comprou o jogo a pré-venda em seu aniversário e esperou ansiosamente pelo lançamento. Era incrível, tantos heróis para escolher e cada um com características únicas. o tempos passou e continuei jogando até o Lvl 400 por aí.
Retorno ai jogo e vejo o caos, ainda está... Divertidinho posso dizer, porém o mesmo não vale a pena e muito tempo qualquer investimento Ingame. Overwatch 2 é uma cópia BARATA do primeiro... Na vdd é exatamente o mesmo jogo só alterando o nome LITERALMENTE. Mesmos heróis (com a adição de alguns novos que pode ser Obtidos através do item chamado "Cartão de crédito")
- Alguns mapas novos porém menos do que seu antecessor
- Agora os grupos são menores ou seja menos players por partida 
-uma segurança fraca na rede visto que conforme tenho jogado parece até que estou em uma partida de Point Blank
As famosas Loot Boxes foram removidas "Ah mas ecaio pera ae, isso é bom mano" seria de fato jovem gafanhoto se estas você não recebesse antes sempre que upasse de lvl, era o unico meio de adquirir skins... Agora é só com aquele item lendário mencionado antes e se prepare pois cada uma custa a média dos 80 reais para mais 
!!!MAS EI!!! MODO HISTÓRIA, A GRANDE PROMESSA INICIAL DO JOGO... que te da acesso a 3 missões caso vc desembolse 70 reais "Mas ecaio eu comprei o jogo um" PAU NO SEU CU é o que a blizzard quer dizer agora e se vc assim como pegou o primeiro game nada mais que vegonha pra mim e para você pois eles só passaram este por cima e esqueceram que você COMPROU o produto.

Enfim caso vc só busca algo para jogar uns 2 dias com seus amigos... pegue terraria vale mais a pena e ele não vai enfiar o dedo do meio na sua cara, Overwatch 2 não liga para sua player base somente para seu dinheiro e da forma mais escancarada possível

The previous game was special for me, it appeared at a special time for me and gave me a lot of good emotions and memories. And when the second part was first announced with only pve content, I was happy like everyone else, but something went wrong... The most important people who created the first game left,  and instead of them they put r3tards who do sh!t, don't understand what need to do, or they deeply don't care the game itself... The second part became an empty shell and to spend even a second of time in it is to disrespect yourself, but I do not regret a single cent when I bought the first part (  they f4cking didn't thank the veterans, only three heroes for free at the start and go f4ck yourself).  So that you do not spoil your mood with bugs, leaky gameplay and simply do not get disappointed in this game, just go you know where and see a better version of overwatch from the community.

今天上班被长得像温斯顿的领导骂了，长得像DVA的梦中情人被领导给撅了，长得像天使的温柔学姐准备劝说也被撅了，长得像76的老父亲前来讨回公道，被长得像死神的保安给撅了，长得像源氏的学弟躲在角落里瑟瑟发抖，拔出了龙刃，长得像半藏的学弟哥哥也忍俊不禁的参加进了这场淫pa...
我翻开这守望一查，这守望史没有年代，歪歪斜斜的每页上都写着“我必须回应，一如既往”几个字。
我横竖睡不着，仔细看了半夜才从字眼里看出字来，满本都写着两个字，“撅人！”
